Pleased the House passed my amendment to stop the Trump administration from ending the #ACA automatic re-enrollment program, ensuring that 2 million Americans will keep their health insurance. Looking forward to voting for the final bill tonight. #ProtectOurCare

Today I introduced the #LIFTAmerica Act with all of my @EnergyCommerce Dem colleagues. This comprehensive infrastructure bill fights #ClimateChange, expands rural broadband and protects public health and the environment. #InfrastructureWeek

On this #PoliceOfficersMemorialDay, we honor those who keep our communities safe in Vermont and around the country. This year marks the 30th anniversary of the groundbreaking for the National Law Enforcement Officers Memorial in DC. #PoliceWeek2019

Vermonters are fed up with intrusive robocalls that are annoying at best and predatory at worst. Today I’m at Burlington Airport talking about legislation that I’ve cosponsored to put an end to this explosion of unwanted robocalls. #vtpoli pic.twitter.com/1w8Mcs70Mt
